org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend

Class RMConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.authentication.Connection<RMAuthentication>
      • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend.RMConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Loggable

    @PublicAPI
public class RMConnection
extends Connection<RMAuthentication>
    This class provides means to connect to an existing RM. As a result of connection returns RMAuthentication for further authentication.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public org.apache.log4j.Logger getLogger()
        Description copied from interface: Loggable
        Retrieves a corresponding logger.

      • getInstance

        public static RMConnection getInstance()

      • join

        public static RMAuthentication join(String url)
                             throws RMException
        Returns the RMAuthentication from the specified URL. If resource manager is not available or initializing throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the resource manager to join.
        Returns:
        the resource manager authentication at the specified URL.
        Throws:
        RMException - thrown if the connection to the resource manager cannot be established.

      • waitAndJoin

        public static RMAuthentication waitAndJoin(String url)
                                    throws RMException
        Connects to the resource manager using given URL. The current thread will be block until connection established or an error occurs.
        Throws:
        RMException

      • waitAndJoin

        public static RMAuthentication waitAndJoin(String url,
                                           long timeout)
                                    throws RMException
        Connects to the resource manager with a specified timeout value. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout. The connection will then block until established or an error occurs.
        Throws:
        RMException
